General.Name: Foshan Electrical and Lighting Co Ltd
General.Description: Foshan Electrical and Lighting Co.,Ltd engages in the design, manufacture, and marketing of lighting products, auto lamps, and electrical products in the People's Republic of China and internationally. It offers LED light sources, LED indoor and outdoor lighting, electrical tapes, switch panels, power sockets, breeding and plant lighting, and traditional lighting products under the FSL brand. The company also provides automotive lighting products; and LED packaging products comprising modules, LED epitaxial wafers and chips, electronic components, integrated circuit products and accessories, and semiconductor products that are widely used in consumer electronics, home appliances, computers, communications, display and lighting products, general lighting, automotive lighting, sterilization and purification, plant lighting, and other fields. The company was founded in 1958 and is headquartered in Foshan, the People's Republic of China.
General.Address: No. 64, Fenjiang North Road, Foshan, China, 528000
